content: this crochet cat clown charm is ready for the big top or to hang off your bag strap stitched in red heart super saver super craft kit the pattern is worked in pieces and then seamed together a great small project for practicing a variety of techniques this kitty is made mostly of single_crochet and basic increases and decreases while the big neck ruffle is worked in double_crochet safety eyes and face paint give this feline a spotlight-ready look play around with color choices to create a cat that adds personality to your world materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ kit includes 12 balls 1 7 oz/50 g each 21 oz /600 g total yardage 93 yds/85 m each 1116 yds/1020 m total contrast a soft white 1 ball or 11 yds/10 m contrast b shocking pink 1 ball or 6 yds/5 5 m contrast c saffron 1 ball or 15 yds/ 14 m contrast d royal blue 1 ball or 9 yds/8 m measurement approx 5 12 5 cm tall contrast e cherry red 1 ball or 2 yds/2 m
